1062850.name: Sage Mountain
1062850.description:
You who used to work as a developer in a city. The longing for your hometown has grown so great that you come back to your hometown.
When you opened your eyes to the mysterious light of the shrine, you realized that 575 years ago you came back.
How do you survive in this poor town?

Sage Mountain is an oriental fantasy farming game.
You will spend most of your time farming, fishing and cooking after a time travel to the past.
You will also have relationships with the village people.
Find the monsters hidden all over!

Feature
  • Make up the farm! Learn how the villagers live and mingle. Plant crops, fruits.
  • Try fishing, too. If you want to have time to think alone, catch fish!
  • Find the monsters hiding everywhere and get your hands on them!
  • Take the risk of finding mate/rials and make special items.
  • I'm a Chef! Try to grow and process the crops you need to cook!
  • Get wood, stone, ore to make furniture and items!
